section.name: My First Spell
section.p: Unpack the demo and you will see a root directory containing an index and two sub-directories - one for the widget project and another for the gizmo project.
The following command invokes a reactor build that initates the build of all registered projects with a basedir within the scope of the current directory (i.e. widget and gizmo).
